duties_responsibilities.duty: Correspond with multiple shipping companies and their contacts to coordinate the shipping and tracking of packages.
Coordinate trailers to corresponding dock doors and cross docks using SSP (Shipping and Shipment Planning) software.
Troubleshoot shipping problems and errors to resolution to ensure smooth transportation processes.
Ensure trailer utilization is maximized to control transportation costs and maintain on-time dock performance.
Assist in updating Staging POD 5s and resource allocation, and oversee Load Flow Control for the building.
Maintain load level performance tracking for load planning, on-time dock performance, utilization, and misloads.
Coordinate with Transportation teams on Driver issues, Trailer Pool needs, Yard Move Delays, Late Inbound volume, and Load Swaps to protect customer experience.
Ensure comprehensive understanding of shipping requirements, rules, and obligations by carrier, destination, and package type to ensure compliance and efficiency.
Ensure all safety measures and precautions are in place and being used regarding the docks and trailers, and assist in training associates on SOP compliance.
Participate in safety initiatives and refer all job injuries or safety violations immediately to the Area Manager.
